author: Scavenius, Laurentius Martini
title: De fidei salvific¾ principio ac fundamento in Christo Jesu theses theologic¾, in publicam disputationem in Academia Hafniensi ad d. 14. & 17. Decemb. volente Deo proposit¾ quarum veritatem defendent ... pro laurea doctorali in s.s. theologia impetranda, A
